FontString.name: $parentName
FontString.text: [longest item name ever ever ever ever ever ever]

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPLEFT", 0, 0) GameTooltip:AddLine('LC', 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine('Left-click to toggle frame') GameTooltip:AddLine('Right-click for options') -- GameTooltip:AddLine(DPSMate.L["minimapright"], 0.5, 0.5, 0.5) GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if arg1 == "LeftButton" then toggleMainWindow() else ShowLCMinimapDropdown() end
